casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Paul J. BETTS, Jr., Defendant-Appellant. SC: 148981
COA: 319642 Supreme Court of Michigan. February 1, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the American Civil Liberties Union of Michigan to file a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on January 29, 2019, is accepted for filing.
